d.Name: Automation of Source-to-Pay with SAP Business Network (42K) Using SAP Integration Suite
d.Description:
Use this package to transform the SOAP transactions from SAP S/4HANA Cloud or SAP S/4HANA into cXML output supported by SAP Business Network.

  • The package contains artifacts with supporting integration flow templates to configure inbound and outbound communication, and different document types.
  • You must configure the artifacts required for communication. But you can choose to configure the required document types for your business scenario. For example, if your business scenario involves the purchase order and order confirmation document types, you must configure and deploy the artifacts for those two document types.
  • The supported document types are request for quotation (RFQ), quote message (Award), purchase order, order confirmation, advance ship notice, invoice, ERS invoice (carbon copy), invoice status update, service entry sheet, service entry sheet (response), goods receipt, payment proposal, payment proposal update, payment remittance, and payment remittance (Cancel).
d.ShortText: Integrate transactional data from SAP S/4HANA Cloud or SAP S/4HANA to SAP Business Network in the 42K integration scenario.
